title: Mermaid Prince
original_name: 人魚の王子さま 〜マーメイド・プリンス〜
sinopse:
Once upon a time, there was a mermaid: "I want to become human so I can fall in love" she said. When her wish was granted, the lower half of her body turned to foam and she became a human... MALE♂!?

This is the love story of a 30-year-old virgin man and a beautiful (male?) mermaid!

(Source: 200 wpm)
